subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Freddy Adu scored his first goal as a member of the United States national team, and Jozy Altidore assisted on Kenny Cooper’s sliding shot, leading the Americans to a 2-0 win over Guatemala in a World Cup qualifier in Commerce City, Colo.
snippet: Freddy Adu scored his first goal as a member of the United States national team, and Jozy Altidore assisted on Kenny Cooper’s sliding shot, leading the Americans to a 2-0 win over Guatemala in a World Cup qualifier in Commerce City, Colo.
